text: Ezɨ Abisai 30plan mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavibar faragha zuir gumazim.23:18 Gumazir maba ghaze, namban kam a 30 puvatɨ. Me ghaze, a ti 3plan gumazibav gei. An aveghbuam Joap, ezɨ aningɨn amebam Seruia. Dughiar mamɨn Abisai uan afuzim inigha 300plan apanibav soghezɨ me bar ariaghire. Kamaghɨn, a uaghan mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavir 3plan kaba ko ziar ekiam iti.
